block.p: SCHNEIDER-Zachary. Of Springfield, NJ. Beloved husband of Marylin. Devoted father of Mark, Mindy, Jay and David. Cherished father-in-law of Elisa Leib. Dear brother of Eddie and Morris. Services Bernheim Apter Goldsticker Suburban Funeral Chapel, 1600 Springfield Avenue, Maplewood, NJ, Tuesday, 11 AM. Donations to Congregation Israel of Springfield or the Leukemia Society of America would be appreciated.
